changelog:
- kernel: Upstream to 4.9.164
- Back to custom Launcher3Quickstep
- Added dark Google feed support 
- Introduce JamesDSP (MusicFX)
- Added Grid (Android Go) recents style
- Fixed multiple power dialog animations
- Added option to Display Data Disabled Indicator Icon
- Allow switch to pre P mobile icon style
- Allow hide arrows in Network Traffic indicators
- Update WeatherClient
- Improve stability and performance
- Another small fixes and tweaks
